channel.title: [PI] 2 problems, hope you know 1 of them
channel.description:
1. RunIndex anim with 2h. If i do ::anim 4305, it doesn't show me the Run anim. So i need it works. Please explain good, need the currect codes, etc..
2. Skillcape Gfx, the anims are fully working.. But the gfx "fail", so need the currect codes for gfx, please explain good, and i got on my cache, "Animation" + "Animation2" + "data" + "Raw",
Hope you help me with any problem guys, I'll repp++
I got teamviewer if you like to help me with it.
